review: The base which should be placed in the cup compartment in not adjustable, it either fits in your car or it doesn't. The deeper the compartment the more stable the the whole thing would be.In my car, the cup compartment is not so deep so the base doesn't stay in place, it's shaky.If I'll improve the product, I would make the base adjustable to different cup compartment sizes; or, at least put a suction cup below the base to help it stick in place.
productTitle: Evelots Automobile Swivel Tray Car Truck Food Snacks Electronics Cup Holder
